definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
to evade/to dodge (out of the way)
to glitter like frost and snow (idiom)

sentences.english: The gold glinted in the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 金子在阳光下闪闪发光。

sentences.english: The tall Gothic windows glinted in the sinking sun.
sentences.chinese: 高大的哥特式窗户在夕阳的照耀下闪闪发光。

sentences.english: Eg. For the second time in her life she made an indirect answer.
sentences.chinese: 这是她有生以来第二次说话躲躲闪闪。

sentences.english: The web was silver and gold in the evening sun.
sentences.chinese: 网在落日余晖中银光光金闪闪。

sentences.english: The wet grass sparkles in the sun.

sentences.chinese: 火箭闪闪发光升入夜空。

sentences.english: Photorealistic and sparkly screen-printed graphics at front.
sentences.chinese: 闪闪发光的真实感和丝网印刷在前面的图形。

sentences.english: Single-prong solid brass square buckle in gleaming silver-colored metal.
sentences.chinese: 单管齐下闪闪发光的银色实心黄铜方扣，有色金属。

sentences.english: Did you see the way her eyes sparkled? She's so hsoftwarey.
sentences.chinese: 你们看到她闪闪发亮的眼神了吗？她很开心。

sentences.english: They ricochet off the armor, leaving drops of glistening venom.
sentences.chinese: 射弹被盔甲反弹回去，盔甲上留下闪闪发光的毒液。

sentences.english: Glittering stars make a subtle statement of prettiness on any occasion.
sentences.chinese: 闪闪发光的星星让你在任何场合都显得可爱。

sentences.english: Clean, bright, maybe a little sparkly, right?
sentences.chinese: 干净，明亮，也许有点闪闪发光，是吗？

sentences.english: Rosie's diamond ring sparkled in the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 萝西的钻戒在阳光下闪闪发光。

sentences.english: All that glitters is not gold.
sentences.chinese: 闪闪发光者未必都是金。
“RL瑞龙”，压花闪闪发光的金属单管齐马镫扣。

sentences.english: Roughly 1.5million of the twinkling gems are created every second.
sentences.chinese: 大约每秒能产生150万颗闪闪发光的宝石。

definition: to dazzle/to brighten up (a room etc)
a glimmer/twinkling (of stars, phosphorescence, candlelight)/flickering light
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
